title: Workplace privacy maintained from personal life
description: Workplace privacy maintained from personal life
content:
Scenario: Workplace privacy maintained from personal life
    Given Aisha's workplace should not access personal data
    And she has full privacy rights
    When workplace and personal systems interact
    Then strict privacy boundaries must be enforced
    And workplace should have zero access to personal life data
    And personal_agent should protect her information
    And workplace_elohim should respect privacy completely
    And the system should prevent workplace surveillance
    And professional and personal spheres should remain separate
